diff_hunk:
@@ -6815,6 +6809,9 @@ def post_add_test(test_name, skipTestIf, do_test):
     for skip in skipTestIf:
         do_test = skip(do_test)
 
+    if test_name in EXCLUDE_SCRIPT or test_name in EXCLUDE_TRACED:
body: I noticed that, would it be worthwhile to break up the script testing and tracer testing into separate unit tests? If not then you can't tell which is failing (some of the excluded tests pass as script functions but not as traced functions)
